title: LF Clash team (Support Main)
body:
Last season was G2 Flex, G4 Solo/Duo.
Usually play Soraka, Nami, Shen, Leona, and Yuumi.

If i'm not confident in the lineup, ill play Pyke, Brand, Senna, and Morg (The big damages to make up for the little damages I see).

replies.body: Hey, we have a 3 man looking for a support, around gold 3 last season, would love to have you on our team.

Add me and ill accept in the morning my dude.
IGN: Exarch Leona
